**Overview**

This dashboard shows a statistics related to unique Network Flows, captured by the Network Package Capture Integration.

Other networking dashboards are also available on the [**Security Solution Page**](/app/security/explore)



[**Integration Page**](/app/integrations/detail/network_traffic/overview)
